amendment.description: Add at the end the following: TITLE III--MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS SEC. 301. SECRETARIAL ORDER NOT AFFECTED. Nothing in this Act shall be construed as to affect any aspect of Secretarial Order 3324, issued by the Secretary of the Interior on December 3, 2012, with respect to potash and oil and gas operators.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 113-214 to clarify the intention of the bill that it will not impact Secretarial Order 3324, as it relates to oil/gas and potash.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Pearce.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
